original: Åkeson, Gustaf Fredrik Einar, bankdirektör, Eksjö, f. 5/10/91 i Oskarshamn av C. Åkeson o. Jenny Larsson. G. m. Ebba Larsson. Barn: Margareta f. 34. — Realex., hand:sk. Stat:-skriv. v. Nässjö-Oskarshamns nya Järnv. A-B 11-17, anst. v. Sydsv. Kredit A-B 17, kamrer 27, kont:chef v. Skånska bankens Eksjökont. 34, dir. där 39. Medl. av Frimurarorden.
translated: Åkeson, Gustaf Fredrik Einar, bank director, Eksjö, b. 5/10/91 in Oskarshamn to C. Åkeson and Jenny Larsson. Married to Ebba Larsson. Children: Margareta b. 34. — Completed secondary education, had handwriting skills. Employed at Nässjö-Oskarshamns new Railway Company 11-17, employed at South Sweden Credit Company 17, cashier 27, head of accounts department at Skånska Bank's Eksjö branch 34, director there 39. Member of the Freemason Order.
